title: Contributing
text:
To contribute a case study please create a github issue or email.
Case studies should be written in quarto html format.

title: Bayes in Drug Development
text:
Welcome to the XXXX website for using Bayesian statistics in drug development.
Our Case Studies give detailed examples of application of Bayesian methodology.
See Contributing for details on how to contribute a case study.

title: Dynamic Borrowing in Early Development Oncology
text: In a rare oncology indication, we planned a small trial and augmented the results with external control data to aid in decision making for the continued development.
